line.originaltext: Place all ingredients (except sunflower seeds) in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.

line.annotation: combine({ing49, ing50, ing51, ing52, ing53, ing54, ing55, ing56}, ing58, "all ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: Place all ingredients (except sunflower seeds) in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
Select basic white cycle; press start.
Select basic white cycle; press start.
Add the sunflower seeds when the alert sounds during the knead cycle.
Add the sunflower seeds when the alert sounds during the knead cycle.
